card.name: Baffling End
card.property: When Baffling End enters the battlefield, exile target creature an opponent controls with converted mana cost 3 or less. When Baffling End leaves the battlefield, target opponent creates a 3/3 green Dinosaur creature token with trample.

card.name: Bishop of Binding
card.property: When Bishop of Binding enters the battlefield, exile target creature an opponent controls until Bishop of Binding leaves the battlefield. Whenever Bishop of Binding attacks, target Vampire gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is the power of the exiled card.

card.name: Blazing Hope
card.property: Exile target creature with power greater than or equal to your life total.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "No shadow remains for you to hide in." —Caparocti Sunborn

card.name: Cleansing Ray
card.property: Choose one — • Destroy target Vampire. • Destroy target enchantment.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The sun creates, sustains, and consumes so it can create again." —Caparocti Sunborn

card.name: Divine Verdict
card.property: Destroy target attacking or blocking creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Cunning warriors and dim-witted beasts alike fall under the church's harsh judgment.

card.name: Everdawn Champion
card.property: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt to Everdawn Champion.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Undefeated in battle, she is the shining future our empire deserves." —Huatli

card.name: Exultant Skymarcher
card.property: Flying

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We have come at last to this holiest of holy places. What was stolen from us long ago is ours once again."

card.name: Famished Paladin
card.property: Famished Paladin doesn't untap during your untap step. Whenever you gain life, untap Famished Paladin.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Loyal to his queen, slave to his thirst.

card.name: Forerunner of the Legion
card.property: When Forerunner of the Legion enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a Vampire card, reveal it, then shuffle your library and put that card on top of it. Whenever another Vampire enters the battlefield under your control, target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Imperial Ceratops
card.property: Enrage — Whenever Imperial Ceratops is dealt damage, you gain 2 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The music of blades against its silver armor merely inspires it to bellow more full-throated melodies." —Huatli

card.name: Legion Conquistador
card.property: When Legion Conquistador enters the battlefield, you may search your library for any number of cards named Legion Conquistador, reveal them, put them into your hand, then shuffle your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Legion of Dusk sailed from Torrezon in search of glory, riches, and the Immortal Sun.

card.name: Luminous Bonds
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature can't attack or block.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Your part in this fight is done, vampire. Get used to your thirst."

card.name: Majestic Heliopterus
card.property: Flying Whenever Majestic Heliopterus attacks, another target Dinosaur you control gains flying until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Its rise is like the sun's, a beautiful beginning. Its descent is like the sun's, a frightful ending." —Huatli

card.name: Martyr of Dusk
card.property: When Martyr of Dusk dies, create a 1/1 white Vampire creature token with lifelink.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Should I fall, take up our standard and carry on. The Legion must always prevail."

card.name: Moment of Triumph
card.property: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn. You gain 2 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The time of salvation is at hand. Dusk washes over the world, and the Legion will rise immortal!"

card.name: Paladin of Atonement
card.property: At the beginning of each upkeep, if you lost life last turn, put a +1/+1 counter on Paladin of Atonement. When Paladin of Atonement dies, you gain life equal to its toughness.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: For every wound there is a blessing; for every death, a reckoning.

card.name: Pride of Conquerors
card.property: Ascend (If you control ten or more permanents, you get the city's blessing for the rest of the game.) Creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn. If you have the city's blessing, those creatures get +2/+2 until end of turn instead.

card.name: Radiant Destiny
card.property: Ascend (If you control ten or more permanents, you get the city's blessing for the rest of the game.) As Radiant Destiny enters the battlefield, choose a creature type. Creatures you control of the chosen type get +1/+1. As long as you have the city's blessing, they also have vigilance.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The abundance of foes in Orazca means the raptors no longer need any orders.

card.name: Sanguine Glorifier
card.property: When Sanguine Glorifier enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on another target Vampire you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: For the Legion of Dusk, the Immortal Sun is a source of eternal life. When they reclaim it, they will no longer be forced to subsist on the blood of the wicked.

card.name: Skymarcher Aspirant
card.property: Ascend (If you control ten or more permanents, you get the city's blessing for the rest of the game.) Skymarcher Aspirant has flying as long as you have the city's blessing.

card.name: Slaughter the Strong
card.property: Each player chooses any number of creatures they control with total power 4 or less, then sacrifices all other creatures they control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Cut the beasts out from under them and their strength is nothing." —Vona of Iedo, Butcher of Magan

card.name: Snubhorn Sentry
card.property: Ascend (If you control ten or more permanents, you get the city's blessing for the rest of the game.) Snubhorn Sentry gets +3/+0 as long as you have the city's blessing.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: They're fun to train—if you like stubborn, aggressive, and fiercely territorial.

card.name: Sphinx's Decree
card.property: Each opponent can't cast instant or sorcery spells during that player's next turn.

card.name: Squire's Devotion
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 and has lifelink. When Squire's Devotion enters the battlefield, create a 1/1 white Vampire creature token with lifelink.

card.name: Sun Sentinel
card.property: Vigilance (Attacking doesn't cause this creature to tap.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I will not sleep until Orazca is ours once more."

card.name: Sun-Crested Pterodon
card.property: Flying Sun-Crested Pterodon has vigilance as long as you control another Dinosaur.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Pterodons tolerate no intrusion into their skies. Even the clouds must ask permission." —Mahuiz, Sun Empire archer

card.name: Temple Altisaur
card.property: If a source would deal damage to another Dinosaur you control, prevent all but 1 of that damage.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Kinjalli sculpted humans from clay, but the dinosaurs were carved from unyielding stone." —Itzama the Crested

card.name: Trapjaw Tyrant
card.property: Enrage — Whenever Trapjaw Tyrant is dealt damage, exile target creature an opponent controls until Trapjaw Tyrant leaves the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I would advise you not to struggle." —Huatli

card.name: Zetalpa, Primal Dawn
card.property: Flying, double strike, vigilance, trample, indestructible

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The sky takes flight and the earth trembles.

card.name: Admiral's Order
card.property: Raid — If you attacked this turn, you may pay {U} rather than pay this spell's mana cost. Counter target spell.

card.name: Aquatic Incursion
card.property: When Aquatic Incursion enters the battlefield, create two 1/1 blue Merfolk creature tokens with hexproof. (They can't be the targets of spells or abilities your opponents control.) {3}{U}: Target Merfolk can't be blocked this turn.

card.name: Crafty Cutpurse
card.property: Flash When Crafty Cutpurse enters the battlefield, each token that would be created under an opponent's control this turn is created under your control instead.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Possession is eleven-tenths of the pirate code.

card.name: Crashing Tide
card.property: Crashing Tide has flash as long as you control a Merfolk. Return target creature to its owner's hand. Draw a card.

card.name: Curious Obsession
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 and has "Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, you may draw a card." At the beginning of your end step, if you didn't attack with a creature this turn, sacrifice Curious Obsession.

card.name: Deadeye Rig-Hauler
card.property: Raid — When Deadeye Rig-Hauler enters the battlefield, if you attacked this turn, you may return target creature to its owner's hand.

card.name: Expel from Orazca
card.property: Ascend (If you control ten or more permanents, you get the city's blessing for the rest of the game.) Return target nonland permanent to its owner's hand. If you have the city's blessing, you may put that permanent on top of its owner's library instead.

card.name: Flood of Recollection
card.property: Return target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand. Exile Flood of Recollection.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Jace tumbled down the waterfall and plunged deep into his past.

card.name: Hornswoggle
card.property: Counter target creature spell. You create a Treasure token. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Being a merciful pirate, she saved the vampire's gold from falling overboard.

card.name: Induced Amnesia
card.property: When Induced Amnesia enters the battlefield, target player exiles all cards from their hand face down, then draws that many cards. When Induced Amnesia is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, return the exiled cards to their owner's hand.

card.name: Kitesail Corsair
card.property: Kitesail Corsair has flying as long as it's attacking.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Why perch in the crow's nest when I can fly like the crows?"

card.name: Kumena's Awakening
card.property: Ascend (If you control ten or more permanents, you get the city's blessing for the rest of the game.) At the beginning of your upkeep, each player draws a card. If you have the city's blessing, instead only you draw a card.

card.name: Mist-Cloaked Herald
card.property: Mist-Cloaked Herald can't be blocked.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: With matchless stealth, the River Heralds fought a running battle against the three enemy forces.

card.name: Negate
card.property: Counter target noncreature spell.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "As one, nature lifts its voice to tell you this: 'No.'"

card.name: Nezahal, Primal Tide
card.property: This spell can't be countered. You have no maximum hand size. Whenever an opponent casts a noncreature spell, draw a card. Discard three cards: Exile Nezahal, Primal Tide. Return it to the battlefield tapped under its owner's control at the beginning of the next end step.

card.name: Release to the Wind
card.property: Exile target nonland permanent. For as long as that card remains exiled, its owner may cast it without paying its mana cost.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Here and gone like a fleeting breeze."

card.name: River Darter
card.property: River Darter can't be blocked by Dinosaurs.

card.name: Riverwise Augur
card.property: When Riverwise Augur enters the battlefield, draw three cards, then put two cards from your hand on top of your library in any order.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Time flows as the rivers do, toward an unknown sea. The wise know to look downstream."

card.name: Sailor of Means
card.property: When Sailor of Means enters the battlefield, create a Treasure token. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The rising tide of Orazca's plunder lifted all ships.

card.name: Sea Legs
card.property: Flash Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +0/+2 as long as it's a Pirate. Otherwise, it gets -2/-0.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "When the waves pick up, either you find your feet or you lose your lunch."

card.name: Seafloor Oracle
card.property: Whenever a Merfolk you control deals combat damage to a player, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Where the light falls dim and blue on broken ships, secrets lie unclaimed.

card.name: Secrets of the Golden City
card.property: Ascend (If you control ten or more permanents, you get the city's blessing for the rest of the game.) Draw two cards. If you have the city's blessing, draw three cards instead.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Stolen knowledge can never be stolen back.

card.name: Silvergill Adept
card.property: As an additional cost to cast this spell, reveal a Merfolk card from your hand or pay {3}. When Silvergill Adept enters the battlefield, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "If you keep to the shallows, you'll never learn the secrets of the depths."

card.name: Siren Reaver
card.property: Raid — This spell costs {1} less to cast if you attacked this turn. Flying

card.name: Slippery Scoundrel
card.property: Ascend (If you control ten or more permanents, you get the city's blessing for the rest of the game.) As long as you have the city's blessing, Slippery Scoundrel has hexproof and can't be blocked.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I'd rather be caught red-handed than leave empty-handed!"

card.name: Soul of the Rapids
card.property: Flying Hexproof (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: With Kumena in control of the Immortal Sun, the rapids rose from their riverbeds and the waterfalls took flight.

card.name: Spire Winder
card.property: Flying Ascend (If you control ten or more permanents, you get the city's blessing for the rest of the game.) Spire Winder gets +1/+1 as long as you have the city's blessing.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: For the River Heralds, the Immortal Sun is an object of terror and devastation. The idea that anyone would retrieve it for their own use is utterly abhorrent.

card.name: Timestream Navigator
card.property: Ascend (If you control ten or more permanents, you get the city's blessing for the rest of the game.) {2}{U}{U}, {T}, Put Timestream Navigator on the bottom of its owner's library: Take an extra turn after this one. Activate this ability only if you have the city's blessing.

card.name: Warkite Marauder
card.property: Flying Whenever Warkite Marauder attacks, target creature defending player controls loses all abilities and has base power and toughness 0/1 until end of turn.

card.name: Waterknot
card.property: Enchant creature When Waterknot enters the battlefield, tap enchanted creature. Enchanted creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step.

card.name: Arterial Flow
card.property: Each opponent discards two cards. If you control a Vampire, each opponent loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It is impious to admit, but I do enjoy pirate blood. Something in the salty tang of it, the spice of rebellion."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The first goblin tried to swim the canal. The second built a raft. The last and craftiest goblin launched herself from a firecannon and soared over the canal, trailing smoke. All were eaten, but only one was cooked.

card.name: Champion of Dusk
card.property: When Champion of Dusk enters the battlefield, you draw X cards and you lose X life, where X is the number of Vampires you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Drench these golden streets in the blood of our enemies."

card.name: Dark Inquiry
card.property: Target opponent reveals their hand. You choose a nonland card from it. That player discards that card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Your mind is no longer yours to waste."

card.name: Dead Man's Chest
card.property: Enchant creature an opponent controls When enchanted creature dies, exile cards equal to its power from the top of its owner's library. You may cast spells from among those cards for as long as they remain exiled, and you may spend mana as though it were mana of any type to cast those spells.

card.name: Dinosaur Hunter
card.property: Whenever Dinosaur Hunter deals damage to a Dinosaur, destroy that creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Aye, the foul beast chomped me, but I got away. You'd best believe when I find it again, it won't get away so easy."

card.name: Dire Fleet Poisoner
card.property: Flash Deathtouch When Dire Fleet Poisoner enters the battlefield, target attacking Pirate you control gets +1/+1 and gains deathtouch until end of turn.

card.name: Dusk Charger
card.property: Ascend (If you control ten or more permanents, you get the city's blessing for the rest of the game.) Dusk Charger gets +2/+2 as long as you have the city's blessing.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Stories say demon blood runs in its veins, making it fearless and bloodthirsty.

card.name: Dusk Legion Zealot
card.property: When Dusk Legion Zealot enters the battlefield, you draw a card and you lose 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Once they reached Orazca, the Legion's explorers ransacked tombs and temples, hunting for the Immortal Sun.

card.name: Fathom Fleet Boarder
card.property: When Fathom Fleet Boarder enters the battlefield, you lose 2 life unless you control another Pirate.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Without frequent raids, orcs sometimes get bored and plunder their own ships.

card.name: Forerunner of the Coalition
card.property: When Forerunner of the Coalition enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a Pirate card, reveal it, then shuffle your library and put that card on top of it. Whenever another Pirate enters the battlefield under your control, each opponent loses 1 life.

card.name: Golden Demise
card.property: Ascend (If you control ten or more permanents, you get the city's blessing for the rest of the game.) All creatures get -2/-2 until end of turn. If you have the city's blessing, instead only creatures your opponents control get -2/-2 until end of turn.

card.name: Grasping Scoundrel
card.property: Grasping Scoundrel gets +1/+0 as long as it's attacking.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I can hear the plunder calling. It asks for me by name."

card.name: Gruesome Fate
card.property: Each opponent loses 1 life for each creature you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You were keen enough to sink your fangs into us, vampire! And now you're afraid of a few little nibbles?" —Udvil "Ratty" Ratlock

card.name: Impale
card.property: Destroy target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Never let the glitter of gold distract you from the gleam of steel in the shadows.

card.name: Mastermind's Acquisition
card.property: Choose one — • Search your library for a card, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library. • Choose a card you own from outside the game and put it into your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Another piece of a nefarious puzzle.

card.name: Mausoleum Harpy
card.property: Flying Ascend (If you control ten or more permanents, you get the city's blessing for the rest of the game.) Whenever another creature you control dies, if you have the city's blessing, put a +1/+1 counter on Mausoleum Harpy.

card.name: Moment of Craving
card.property: Target creature gets -2/-2 until end of turn. You gain 2 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The time of condemnation is at hand. Dusk washes over the world, and I consign you to eternal darkness!"

card.name: Oathsworn Vampire
card.property: Oathsworn Vampire enters the battlefield tapped. You may cast Oathsworn Vampire from your graveyard if you gained life this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "My conquistadors are never slain, merely laid to rest." —Queen Miralda the Pious

card.name: Pitiless Plunderer
card.property: Whenever another creature you control dies, create a Treasure token. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Shame to let good gold go to the grave."

card.name: Ravenous Chupacabra
card.property: When Ravenous Chupacabra enters the battlefield, destroy target creature an opponent controls.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Opening Orazca unleashed more horrors than just the Immortal Sun.

card.name: Reaver Ambush
card.property: Exile target creature with power 3 or less.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Onora knew with sudden, grim certainty he would never see the Great River again.

card.name: Recover
card.property: Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "No more fear of death's oblivion—is this not the greatest treasure of all?" —Gurezan, Legion resurrectionist

card.name: Sadistic Skymarcher
card.property: As an additional cost to cast this spell, reveal a Vampire card from your hand or pay {1}. Flying, lifelink

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I will catch you, child of the sun. I will drink your life and leave you a husk, discarded in the shadows."

card.name: Tetzimoc, Primal Death
card.property: Deathtouch {B}, Reveal Tetzimoc, Primal Death from your hand: Put a prey counter on target creature. Activate this ability only during your turn. When Tetzimoc enters the battlefield, destroy each creature your opponents control with a prey counter on it.

card.name: Tomb Robber
card.property: Menace {1}, Discard a card: Tomb Robber explores. (Reveal the top card of your library. Put that card into your hand if it's a land. Otherwise, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature, then put the card back or put it into your graveyard.)

card.name: Twilight Prophet
card.property: Flying Ascend (If you control ten or more permanents, you get the city's blessing for the rest of the game.) At the beginning of your upkeep, if you have the city's blessing, reveal the top card of your library and put it into your hand. Each opponent loses X life and you gain X life, where X is that card's converted mana cost.

card.name: Vampire Revenant
card.property: Flying

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "A thick fog obscures the port of Leor, but it's not thick enough to muffle the screams." —Admiral Beckett Brass

card.name: Vona's Hunger
card.property: Ascend (If you control ten or more permanents, you get the city's blessing for the rest of the game.) Each opponent sacrifices a creature. If you have the city's blessing, instead each opponent sacrifices half the creatures they control, rounded up.

card.name: Voracious Vampire
card.property: Menace When Voracious Vampire enters the battlefield, target Vampire you control gets +1/+1 and gains menace until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The purest devotion isn't the Blood Fast itself, but the craving that follows.

card.name: Blood Sun
card.property: When Blood Sun enters the battlefield, draw a card. All lands lose all abilities except mana abilities.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: As the struggle raged for control of the Immortal Sun, the world grew dark under a blood-red sky.

card.name: Bombard
card.property: Bombard deals 4 damage to target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Want to sink a ship? Blow a hole in the hull. Want to kill a regisaur? Same answer." —Captain Brandis Thorn

card.name: Brass's Bounty
card.property: For each land you control, create a Treasure token. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Why squabble for trinkets when we could be living large off all this gold?" —Admiral Beckett Brass

card.name: Brazen Freebooter
card.property: When Brazen Freebooter enters the battlefield, create a Treasure token. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")

card.name: Buccaneer's Bravado
card.property: Choose one — • Target creature gets +1/+1 and gains first strike until end of turn. • Target Pirate gets +1/+1 and gains double strike until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Never underestimate the power of panache.

card.name: Charging Tuskodon
card.property: Trample If Charging Tuskodon would deal combat damage to a player, it deals double that damage to that player instead.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It doesn't hold grudges. It runs them down and impales them.

card.name: Daring Buccaneer
card.property: As an additional cost to cast this spell, reveal a Pirate card from your hand or pay {2}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: No ancient lore ties the pirates of the Brazen Coalition to the Immortal Sun. But it's a powerful ancient artifact in a city of gold—what's not to covet?

card.name: Dire Fleet Daredevil
card.property: First strike When Dire Fleet Daredevil enters the battlefield, exile target instant or sorcery card from an opponent's graveyard. You may cast that card this turn, and you may spend mana as though it were mana of any type to cast that spell. If that card would be put into a graveyard this turn, exile it instead.

card.name: Etali, Primal Storm
card.property: Whenever Etali, Primal Storm attacks, exile the top card of each player's library, then you may cast any number of spells from among those cards without paying their mana costs.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The storm rages and the earth breaks.

card.name: Fanatical Firebrand
card.property: Haste {T}, Sacrifice Fanatical Firebrand: It deals 1 damage to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The Brazen Coalition is a firecannon pointed at our enemies. Goblins like him are the spark to its powder." —Admiral Beckett Brass

card.name: Forerunner of the Empire
card.property: When Forerunner of the Empire enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a Dinosaur card, reveal it, then shuffle your library and put that card on top of it. Whenever a Dinosaur enters the battlefield under your control, you may have Forerunner of the Empire deal 1 damage to each creature.

card.name: Form of the Dinosaur
card.property: When Form of the Dinosaur enters the battlefield, your life total becomes 15. At the beginning of your upkeep, Form of the Dinosaur deals 15 damage to target creature an opponent controls and that creature deals damage equal to its power to you.

card.name: Frilled Deathspitter
card.property: Enrage — Whenever Frilled Deathspitter is dealt damage, it deals 2 damage to target opponent or planeswalker.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Nothing says trouble like a reedy hiss with a hint of liquid gurgle.

card.name: Goblin Trailblazer
card.property: Menace

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Why are we following the goblin? Can he even read that map?" —Daphne Vail, Diremore first mate

card.name: Mutiny
card.property: Target creature an opponent controls deals damage equal to its power to another target creature that player controls.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Pirate captains rarely enjoy a peaceful retirement.

card.name: Needletooth Raptor
card.property: Enrage — Whenever Needletooth Raptor is dealt damage, it deals 5 damage to target creature an opponent controls.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It hatches with its ferocity fully grown.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "If you come across a raptor in the city, stay perfectly still. At least then you'll be well rested when you die." —Captain Brandis Thorn

card.name: Pirate's Pillage
card.property: As an additional cost to cast this spell, discard a card. Draw two cards and create two Treasure tokens. (They're artifacts with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Goblins can carry their body weight in loot.

card.name: Reckless Rage
card.property: Reckless Rage deals 4 damage to target creature you don't control and 2 damage to target creature you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Hard to starboard! Starb— Abandon ship! Abandon ship!"

card.name: Rekindling Phoenix
card.property: Flying When Rekindling Phoenix dies, create a 0/1 red Elemental creature token with "At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice this creature and return target card named Rekindling Phoenix from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains haste until end of turn."

card.name: See Red
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +2/+1 and has first strike. At the beginning of your end step, if you didn't attack with a creature this turn, sacrifice See Red.

card.name: Shake the Foundations
card.property: Shake the Foundations deals 1 damage to each creature without flying. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A threefold calamity with a single will.

card.name: Shatter
card.property: Destroy target artifact.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Today it's a miracle of architecture, a marvel of stained glass, a symbol of the Legion's power. Tomorrow, driftwood.

card.name: Silverclad Ferocidons
card.property: Enrage — Whenever Silverclad Ferocidons is dealt damage, each opponent sacrifices a permanent.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Control them? No. I gird them in armor and let them loose." —Yacha, Otepec huntmaster

card.name: Stampeding Horncrest
card.property: Stampeding Horncrest has haste as long as you control another Dinosaur.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When the golden city opened, the dinosaurs inside were eager to greet the new visitors.

card.name: Storm Fleet Swashbuckler
card.property: Ascend (If you control ten or more permanents, you get the city's blessing for the rest of the game.) Storm Fleet Swashbuckler has double strike as long as you have the city's blessing.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "A bolt to the eye, a blade to the neck. That's the way to clear the deck!"

card.name: Sun-Collared Raptor
card.property: Trample {2}{R}: Sun-Collared Raptor gets +3/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "With Tilonalli's gifts, even the smallest of us can become great." —Huatli

card.name: Swaggering Corsair
card.property: Raid — Swaggering Corsair enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it if you attacked this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I'm about to make you famous. From the golden city to High and Dry, they'll talk about how fast you died!"

card.name: Tilonalli's Crown
card.property: Enchant creature When Tilonalli's Crown enters the battlefield, it deals 1 damage to enchanted creature. Enchanted creature gets +3/+0 and has trample.

card.name: Tilonalli's Summoner
card.property: Ascend (If you control ten or more permanents, you get the city's blessing for the rest of the game.) Whenever Tilonalli's Summoner attacks, you may pay {X}{R}. If you do, create X 1/1 red Elemental creature tokens that are tapped and attacking. At the beginning of the next end step, exile those tokens unless you have the city's blessing.

card.name: Aggressive Urge
card.property: Target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Our lives, our homes, and all our history are at risk. Do not speak to me of peace."

card.name: Cacophodon
card.property: Enrage — Whenever Cacophodon is dealt damage, untap target permanent.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When a cacophodon is angry, the whole jungle knows.

card.name: Cherished Hatchling
card.property: When Cherished Hatchling dies, you may cast Dinosaur spells this turn as though they had flash, and whenever you cast a Dinosaur spell this turn, it gains "When this creature enters the battlefield, you may have it fight another target creature."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Despite its appearance, it's anything but defenseless.

card.name: Colossal Dreadmaw
card.property: Trample (This creature can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Remember when it was the most terrifying thing you'd ever seen?" —Captain Lannery Storm

card.name: Crested Herdcaller
card.property: Trample When Crested Herdcaller enters the battlefield, create a 3/3 green Dinosaur creature token with trample.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Our survival, like theirs, depends on our ability to work together." —Huatli, to Tishana

card.name: Deeproot Elite
card.property: Whenever another Merfolk enters the battlefield under your control, put a +1/+1 counter on target Merfolk you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You think I stand alone? I have the forest at my call, the waters at my back. I outnumber you."

card.name: Enter the Unknown
card.property: Target creature you control explores. (Reveal the top card of your library. Put that card into your hand if it's a land. Otherwise, put a +1/+1 counter on the creature, then put the card back or put it into your graveyard.) You may play an additional land this turn.

card.name: Forerunner of the Heralds
card.property: When Forerunner of the Heralds enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a Merfolk card, reveal it, then shuffle your library and put that card on top of it. Whenever another Merfolk enters the battlefield under your control, put a +1/+1 counter on Forerunner of the Heralds.

card.name: Ghalta, Primal Hunger
card.property: This spell costs {X} less to cast, where X is the total power of creatures you control. Trample

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The earth walks, strongest of all.

card.name: Giltgrove Stalker
card.property: Giltgrove Stalker can't be blocked by creatures with power 2 or less.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The only gold I need is the sheltering shimmer of the trees."

card.name: Hardy Veteran
card.property: As long as it's your turn, Hardy Veteran gets +0/+2.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: For the Sun Empire, the Immortal Sun is a symbol of national identity. When they reclaim it, the Empire will flourish once more.

card.name: Hunt the Weak
card.property: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control. Then that creature fights target creature you don't control. (Each deals damage equal to its power to the other.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Death lizard approaching, cap'n!" —Brint Doobin, last words

card.name: Jade Bearer
card.property: When Jade Bearer enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on another target Merfolk you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Sisora wore this, who defeated the tyrant of Azcanta, and before her Natena of Vuhana's band. May it bring you their strength."

card.name: Jadecraft Artisan
card.property: When Jadecraft Artisan enters the battlefield, target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "A blade is not fully forged until it is given."

card.name: Jadelight Ranger
card.property: When Jadelight Ranger enters the battlefield, it explores, then it explores again. (Reveal the top card of your library. Put that card into your hand if it's a land. Otherwise, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature, then put the card back or put it into your graveyard. Then repeat this process.)

card.name: Jungleborn Pioneer
card.property: When Jungleborn Pioneer enters the battlefield, create a 1/1 blue Merfolk creature token with hexproof. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We fought so long to hide this place. Let us be first to learn its wonders!"

card.name: Knight of the Stampede
card.property: Dinosaur spells you cast cost {2} less to cast.

card.name: Naturalize
card.property: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Better to let the sword go than to lose the arm with it." —Captain Lannery Storm

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The frillbacks of Orazca soak up the sun on their tall spinal fins. They look slow and sleepy—until they catch the scent of prey.

card.name: Overgrown Armasaur
card.property: Enrage — Whenever Overgrown Armasaur is dealt damage, create a 1/1 green Saproling creature token.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It embodies the riotous growth of the jungle, where creatures crowd upon creatures, where roots sprawl and vines swarm.

card.name: Path of Discovery
card.property: Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control, it explores. (Reveal the top card of your library. Put that card into your hand if it's a land. Otherwise, put a +1/+1 counter on the creature, then put the card back or put it into your graveyard.)

card.name: Plummet
card.property: Destroy target creature with flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Still, the pterodon chasing the clouds from its skies must bow to the great forest below."—Mahuiz, Sun Empire archer

card.name: Polyraptor
card.property: Enrage — Whenever Polyraptor is dealt damage, create a token that's a copy of Polyraptor.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: An innumerable pack is concealed in a single reflection.

card.name: Strength of the Pack
card.property: Put two +1/+1 counters on each creature you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The pack that ambushes, eviscerates, and devours together stays together.

card.name: Swift Warden
card.property: Flash When Swift Warden enters the battlefield, target Merfolk you control gains hexproof until end of turn. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A warning shout would take too long.

card.name: Tendershoot Dryad
card.property: Ascend (If you control ten or more permanents, you get the city's blessing for the rest of the game.) At the beginning of each upkeep, create a 1/1 green Saproling creature token. Saprolings you control get +2/+2 as long as you have the city's blessing.

card.name: Thrashing Brontodon
card.property: {1}, Sacrifice Thrashing Brontodon: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It cares more about preserving the herd's territory than about preserving itself.

card.name: Thunderherd Migration
card.property: As an additional cost to cast this spell, reveal a Dinosaur card from your hand or pay {1}. Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The herds follow as new growth arises.

card.name: Wayward Swordtooth
card.property: Ascend (If you control ten or more permanents, you get the city's blessing for the rest of the game.) You may play an additional land on each of your turns. Wayward Swordtooth can't attack or block unless you have the city's blessing.

card.name: World Shaper
card.property: Whenever World Shaper attacks, you may put the top three cards of your library into your graveyard. When World Shaper dies, put all land cards from your graveyard onto the battlefield tapped.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The Great River will not be tamed."

card.name: Angrath, the Flame-Chained
card.property: +1: Each opponent discards a card and loses 2 life. −3: Gain control of target creature until end of turn. Untap it. It gains haste until end of turn. Sacrifice it at the beginning of the next end step if it has converted mana cost 3 or less. −8: Each opponent loses life equal to the number of cards in their graveyard.

card.name: Atzocan Seer
card.property: {T}: Add one mana of any color. Sacrifice Atzocan Seer: Return target Dinosaur card from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Streams of gold and bright feathers flash in the orb, visions of past and future.

card.name: Azor, the Lawbringer
card.property: Flying When Azor, the Lawbringer enters the battlefield, each opponent can't cast instant or sorcery spells during that player's next turn. Whenever Azor attacks, you may pay {X}{W}{U}{U}. If you do, you gain X life and draw X cards.

card.name: Deadeye Brawler
card.property: Deathtouch Ascend (If you control ten or more permanents, you get the city's blessing for the rest of the game.) Whenever Deadeye Brawler deals combat damage to a player, if you have the city's blessing, draw a card.

card.name: Dire Fleet Neckbreaker
card.property: Attacking Pirates you control get +2/+0.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The buccaneers scaled the sides of buildings as easily as they boarded enemy ships.

card.name: Elenda, the Dusk Rose
card.property: Lifelink Whenever another creature dies, put a +1/+1 counter on Elenda, the Dusk Rose. When Elenda dies, create X 1/1 white Vampire creature tokens with lifelink, where X is Elenda's power.

card.name: Hadana's Climb
card.property: At the beginning of combat on your turn, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control. Then if that creature has three or more +1/+1 counters on it, transform Hadana's Climb.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Hadana seeks power in the service of peace.

alternate.name: Winged Temple of Orazca
alternate.property: (Transforms from Hadana's Climb.) {T}: Add one mana of any color. {1}{G}{U}, {T}: Target creature you control gains flying and gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is its power.

card.name: Huatli, Radiant Champion
card.property: +1: Put a loyalty counter on Huatli, Radiant Champion for each creature you control. −1: Target creature gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is the number of creatures you control. −8: You get an emblem with "Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control, you may draw a card."

card.name: Journey to Eternity
card.property: Enchant creature you control When enchanted creature dies, return it to the battlefield under your control, then return Journey to Eternity to the battlefield transformed under your control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Every journey has its inevitable end . . .

alternate.name: Atzal, Cave of Eternity
alternate.property: (Transforms from Journey to Eternity.) {T}: Add one mana of any color. {3}{B}{G}, {T}: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: . . . but every end is a new beginning.

card.name: Jungle Creeper

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You cannot kill it, not for long. It ripens where the ground is soaked with the blood of the slaughtered." —Atiuru, priest of the Verdant Sun

card.name: Kumena, Tyrant of Orazca
card.property: Tap another untapped Merfolk you control: Kumena, Tyrant of Orazca can't be blocked this turn. Tap three untapped Merfolk you control: Draw a card. Tap five untapped Merfolk you control: Put a +1/+1 counter on each Merfolk you control.

card.name: Legion Lieutenant
card.property: Other Vampires you control get +1/+1.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We long ago abandoned the things that make humans weak: friendship, marriage, family. All that remains is the strength of our devotion."

card.name: Merfolk Mistbinder
card.property: Other Merfolk you control get +1/+1.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The mist clothes us when we are bare, hides us when we are alone, and unites us when we are together." —Nirit of Pashona's band

card.name: Path of Mettle
card.property: When Path of Mettle enters the battlefield, it deals 1 damage to each creature that doesn't have first strike, double strike, vigilance, or haste. Whenever you attack with at least two creatures that have first strike, double strike, vigilance, and/or haste, transform Path of Mettle.

alternate.name: Metzali, Tower of Triumph
alternate.property: (Transforms from Path of Mettle.) {T}: Add one mana of any color. {1}{R}, {T}: Metzali, Tower of Triumph deals 2 damage to each opponent. {2}{W}, {T}: Choose a creature at random that attacked this turn. Destroy that creature.

card.name: Profane Procession

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Vona sought a conqueror. Mavren sought a savior. Both found what they sought . . .

alternate.name: Tomb of the Dusk Rose
alternate.property: (Transforms from Profane Procession.) {T}: Add one mana of any color. {2}{W}{B}, {T}: Put a creature card exiled with this permanent onto the battlefield under your control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: . . . resting in the splendor of the dead.

card.name: Protean Raider
card.property: Raid — If you attacked this turn, you may have Protean Raider enter the battlefield as a copy of any creature on the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Imitation is the sincerest form of piracy.

card.name: Raging Regisaur
card.property: Whenever Raging Regisaur attacks, it deals 1 damage to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Its breath is a gale. Its roar is a volcano. Its anger tears soul from flesh.

card.name: Relentless Raptor
card.property: Vigilance Relentless Raptor attacks or blocks each combat if able.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: As the battle for Orazca unfolded, the contenders discovered that others had already staked a claim.

card.name: Resplendent Griffin
card.property: Flying Ascend (If you control ten or more permanents, you get the city's blessing for the rest of the game.) Whenever Resplendent Griffin attacks, if you have the city's blessing, put a +1/+1 counter on it.

card.name: Siegehorn Ceratops
card.property: Enrage — Whenever Siegehorn Ceratops is dealt damage, put two +1/+1 counters on it. (It must survive the damage to get the counters.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: To a siegehorn, there is no such thing as a dead end.

card.name: Storm Fleet Sprinter
card.property: Haste Storm Fleet Sprinter can't be blocked.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Charge like a red-hot cannonball straight to your target. You slow down, you sink." —Captain Lannery Storm

card.name: Storm the Vault
card.property: Whenever one or more creatures you control deal combat damage to a player, create a Treasure token. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.") At the beginning of your end step, if you control five or more artifacts, transform Storm the Vault.

alternate.name: Vault of Catlacan
alternate.property: (Transforms from Storm the Vault.) {T}: Add one mana of any color. {T}: Add {U} for each artifact you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Swimming in coins proved harder than they'd hoped, but dancing was a jingling delight.

card.name: Zacama, Primal Calamity
card.property: Vigilance, reach, trample When Zacama, Primal Calamity enters the battlefield, if you cast it, untap all lands you control. {2}{R}: Zacama deals 3 damage to target creature. {2}{G}: Destroy target artifact or enchantment. {2}{W}: You gain 3 life.

card.name: Awakened Amalgam
card.property: Awakened Amalgam's power and toughness are each equal to the number of differently named lands you control.

card.name: Azor's Gateway
card.property: {1}, {T}: Draw a card, then exile a card from your hand. If cards with five or more different converted mana costs are exiled with Azor's Gateway, you gain 5 life, untap Azor's Gateway, and transform it.

alternate.name: Sanctum of the Sun
alternate.property: (Transforms from Azor's Gateway.) {T}: Add X mana of any one color, where X is your life total.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: As soon as Jace laid eyes on the great sphinx's chamber, the shards of memory began sliding into place.

card.name: Captain's Hook
Gleaming Barrier
card.property: Defender When Gleaming Barrier dies, create a Treasure token. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Gold without freedom might as well be lead." —Angrath

card.name: Golden Guardian
card.property: Defender {2}: Golden Guardian fights another target creature you control. When Golden Guardian dies this turn, return it to the battlefield transformed under your control.

alternate.name: Gold-Forge Garrison
alternate.property: (Transforms from Golden Guardian.) {T}: Add two mana of any one color. {4}, {T}: Create a 4/4 colorless Golem artifact creature token.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: An army of living gold for the golden city.

card.name: The Immortal Sun
card.property: Players can't activate planeswalkers' loyalty abilities. At the beginning of your draw step, draw an additional card. Spells you cast cost {1} less to cast. Creatures you control get +1/+1.

card.name: Orazca Relic
card.property: Ascend (If you control ten or more permanents, you get the city's blessing for the rest of the game.) {T}: Add {C}. {T}, Sacrifice Orazca Relic: You gain 3 life and draw a card. Activate this ability only if you have the city's blessing.

card.name: Silent Gravestone
card.property: Cards in graveyards can't be the targets of spells or abilities. {4}, {T}: Exile Silent Gravestone and all cards from all graveyards. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Made to ward off the Grim Captain and silence the lure of undeath.

card.name: Strider Harness
card.property: Equipped creature gets +1/+1 and has haste. Equip {1} ({1}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Because the giant, implacable death lizard wasn't scary enough already." —Captain Brinely Rage

card.name: Traveler's Amulet
card.property: {1}, Sacrifice Traveler's Amulet: Search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The best kind of treasure is the kind that leads to more treasure!" —Captain Lannery Storm

card.name: Arch of Orazca
card.property: Ascend (If you control ten or more permanents, you get the city's blessing for the rest of the game.) {T}: Add {C}. {5}, {T}: Draw a card. Activate this ability only if you have the city's blessing.

card.name: Evolving Wilds
card.property: {T}, Sacrifice Evolving Wilds: Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Sun Empire bends nature—rivers, mountainsides, dinosaurs—to its unyielding will.

card.name: Forsaken Sanctuary
card.property: Forsaken Sanctuary enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {W} or {B}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In the galleon's grand cathedral, conquistadors swore vows of faith. In its wreckage, they swore vows of revenge.

card.name: Foul Orchard
card.property: Foul Orchard enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {B} or {G}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The stench of rotting meat lures flies, goblins, and young raptors.

card.name: Highland Lake
card.property: Highland Lake enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {U} or {R}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "A place like this makes me wonder if there's more to life than blood and treasure . . . Nah." —Boyl Bucksalt, Storm Fleet swab

card.name: Stone Quarry
card.property: Stone Quarry enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {R} or {W}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Sun Empire's cities are built from the bones of the earth.

card.name: Woodland Stream
card.property: Woodland Stream enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {G} or {U}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Countless streams flow into the nine rivers, and the nine rivers flow into the Great River. The River Heralds guard them all.

card.name: Vraska, Scheming Gorgon
card.property: +2: Creatures you control get +1/+0 until end of turn. −3: Destroy target creature. −10: Until end of turn, creatures you control gain deathtouch and "Whenever this creature deals damage to an opponent, that player loses the game."

card.name: Vampire Champion
card.property: Deathtouch (Any amount of damage this deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "These pirates must answer for their ancestors, who renounced the Church of Dusk and sailed from Torrezon as heretics."

card.name: Vraska's Conquistador
card.property: Whenever Vraska's Conquistador attacks or blocks, if you control a Vraska planeswalker, target opponent loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Abandoning both queen and church, he chose to follow power.

card.name: Vraska's Scorn
card.property: Target opponent loses 4 life. You may search your library and/or graveyard for a card named Vraska, Scheming Gorgon, reveal it, and put it into your hand. If you search your library this way, shuffle it.

card.name: Angrath, Minotaur Pirate
card.property: +2: Angrath, Minotaur Pirate deals 1 damage to target opponent or planeswalker and each creature that player or that planeswalker's controller controls. −3: Return target Pirate card from your graveyard to the battlefield. −11: Destroy all creatures target opponent controls. Angrath, Minotaur Pirate deals damage to that player equal to their total power.

card.name: Angrath's Ambusher
card.property: Angrath's Ambusher gets +2/+0 as long as you control an Angrath planeswalker.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Orcs have been enemies of the Legion of Dusk since it was formed, and the entire race has been declared anathema.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Though small, goblins can hold their own in a fight. Foolhardy confidence goes a long way.

card.name: Angrath's Fury
card.property: Destroy target creature. Angrath's Fury deals 3 damage to target player or planeswalker. You may search your library and/or graveyard for a card named Angrath, Minotaur Pirate, reveal it, and put it into your hand. If you search your library this way, shuffle it.

card.name: Cinder Barrens
card.property: Cinder Barrens enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {B} or {R}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Burn their fleet to the waterline, and sink whatever's left." —Angrath
